entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
